title: Coachella 2025 Weekend 2 YouTube Live Stream Schedule & Details
description: One more chance to watch Lady Gaga, Green Day, Travis Scott, Post Malone, Missy Elliott, Yeat, Arca, and many others
author: Ryan Kincaid, Matthew Strauss
excerpt: One more chance to watch Lady Gaga, Green Day, Travis Scott, Post Malone, Missy Elliott, Yeat, Arca, and many others
text: The second weekend of the the 2025 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival begins today (Friday, April 18), and you’ll be able to watch a lot of the major acts from the comfort of your home via the festival’s stage-by-stage YouTube livestreams. Among the streaming acts are headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Travis Scott, and Post Malone, along with marquee names like Missy Elliott, Yeat, Kraftwerk, Arca, and Ravyn Lenae. Plus, Ed Sheeran is playing the second weekend, but Weezer will not. html:
The second weekend of the the 2025 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival begins today (Friday, April 18), and you’ll be able to watch a lot of the major acts from the comfort of your home via the festival’s stage-by-stage YouTube livestreams. Among the streaming acts are headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Travis Scott, and Post Malone, along with marquee names like Missy Elliott, Yeat, Kraftwerk, Arca, and Ravyn Lenae. Plus, Ed Sheeran is playing the second weekend, but Weezer will not. See all the details below.

Main Stage Schedule

(All times listed in Pacific Daylight Time)

*schedule is subject to change

Friday, April 18, 2025

4:20 PM - Thee Sacred Souls
5:40 PM - Marina
7:05 PM - Benson Boone
9:00 PM - Missy Elliott
11:10 PM - Lady Gaga
[Rebroadcast]

Saturday, April 19, 2025

4:00 PM - Jimmy Eat World
5:25 PM - T-Pain

[Rebroadcast]
